*Wrath Kamodia payed very much attention to everything Dracona showed them*=

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

  Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:21 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Dr=
acona smiled... "great, we needed members..the radicons looked at each othe=
r angily....with one punch Scamrock knocked down Arrow, but dracona stopped=
 the fight quickly......Dracona pointed out the secrets of the base to Wrat=
h and Kamodia, like the secret passagewaay and stuff.....
    ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
   =
 Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 6:15 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    =
*Wrath and Kamodia begin walking around looking at all the CR Chamber's and=
 Computer's* Kamodia: Well, I seem to like it. Wrath: It didn't take us too=
 long to get in here. *They both turned to Dracona* Kamodia: I wish to join=
. Wrath: Count me in for that.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      Fr=
om: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 200=
0 5:30 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      "yes, you can join us, =
the People's Group!..." Dracona said..... "come on, we'll show you, but pro=
mise not to ever let this slip out......" Dracona said.....Dracona put a bl=
indfold on Wrath and Kamodia and (with Orchid's permission only, if Orchid =
doesn't like this then it doesn't have to happen, just wanted to quicken th=
ings...) took them through the secret passageway..... "thiss is the base...=
.it's all underground...." Dracona said, removing the blindfolds from Wrath=
 and Kamodia.....
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: ilove=
alllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Tuesday, May 30, =
2000 3:36 AM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


        *Wrath and Kamod=
ia turned to look* Wrath: Do you know where we can get a job? *Wrath asked =
to Dracona* *Wrath said as he and Kamodia walked up to Dracona* *Kamodia sm=
iled as she got her wish of meeting some more bots*
          ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

          Sent: Tuesday, May 30, 2000 3:24 AM
          Subject: Re: Neo B=
east Wars


          Dracona and company finishe repairing all except for =
suukie, wgo was injured too bad and would take a long time to repair..Plint=
issa, much to Dracona's anger, had forgotten about their mission and stayed=
 to talk to Suukie....the Radicons and Dracona came from the secret passage=
 way when nobody could possibly see, and walked off searching for some memb=
ers......the Radicons bickered among themselves and Dracona studied the lan=
dscape..Dracona saw Wrath and Kamodia.. "hey, you 2, over here!..." Dracona=
 said, calling out Wrath and Kamodia......the Radicons drew their blasters =
and stood guard, Scamrock laughed and played with his thumbs......Dracona s=
howed her hands empty to show that she came in peace....she waved to Wrath =
and Kamodia.....
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From=
: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Mo=
nday, May 29, 2000 9:12 PM
            Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      =
      *Kamodia thought she saw something for a minute but figures its all i=
n her mond continues walking on*
              ----- Original Message -----=
 
              From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
        Sent: Monday, May 29, 2000 6:43 AM
              Subject: Re: Neo B=
east Wars


              Plintissa looks in the distance and spots Wrath a=
nd Kamodia....Plintissa knows the would be good for the People's Group, but=
 no wway she could invite them with these idiot Truths surrounding her!....=
..she ushers to Wrath and Kamodia, hoping they'll see......
               =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: ilovealllizards 
     =
           To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Monday, May 29, 20=
00 2:15 AM
                Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                *Wrath=
 and Kamodia still stand on the outside of the Maximal base* Wrath: HEEEEYY=
YY!! WE WANT A JOB!!! *Wrath yells at the top of his lungs* *Than he notice=
s Kamodia walking away* Wrath: Where are you going? Kamodia: I'm not sticki=
ng around here when they don't want us. Wrath: How do you know that they do=
n't? Kamodia: If they really wanted us than they'd answer us. *Kamodia turn=
s and walks on looking for another base* *Wrath stands there thinking about=
 what Komodia said and comes to the fact that she's right* Wrath: Hey wait =
up! *Wrath comes running up and catches up with Kamodia* Kamodia: What made=
 you leave? *She says giving off a sly grin* Wrath: I came to the fact that=
 I'm too good for that dump. Kamodia: Come on, admit it! I'm right. If they=
 really wanted us then they would've answered us. *Wrath doesn't answer and=
 keeps looking foward* Kamodia: Your just mad because you know I'm right bu=
t you are right about that place being a dump. *They contiue walking on*
